name: Queso
description: Created in 2011 by Kannabia Seeds using Cheese and Afghani genetics, Queso (Spanish for “cheese”) is a hybrid strain that provides powerful body effects and mood elevation. This potent strain, also know as Kiss, is typically used to relieve pain, anxiety, and insomnia while offering a pugent cheese-like aroma. This aroma comes from then assumed cross of Northern Lights and Skunk, speaking to the 65/35 Indica-dominiant split described by Kannabia. Hailing from Spain, this savory international delight is a treat for anyone lucky enough to get their hands caked with the kiefy cheese dust of this Europian native.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Tingly, Hungry, Creative, Euphoric, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Stress, Depression, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Anxious
